titleInfo.title: Brother Theodore meets with the Basketball Team

mods.abstract: Brother Theodore Drahmann met with the Basketball Team in the President's Office. Left (front to back): Brent Addison , Randy Engel, Chad Becker, Tim Hatcher, Terry Bowles, Brother Theodore. Standing: Mike Rezek. Right (front to back): Len McKnatt, Chis Avery, Shane McGaughy, Corey Champion, Chris Copass, Mike Duncan.
